name: Carma
long_description:
At Carma, we’re revolutionizing the fleet management space by building a massively simplified experience for commercial fleet operators to receive same-day repair and maintenance for any vehicle with real-time, transparent quotes from highly-vetted service center partners with a guaranteed 24-hour turnaround.

Fleet operators face the challenging task of keeping hundreds or thousands of vehicles on the road cost-efficiently with minimal downtime. Our platform solves this precise problem, powering operations for our fleet customers with every tool needed for modern fleet management - real-time service tracking, cost verification, diagnostics visibility, and so much more. We are tackling an enormous market—worth $177 billion in the United States alone.

We're growing very rapidly and are looking for superstars to join us on our rocketship growth as we relentlessly work towards building a multi-billion dollar company to take over the outdated fleet management market.

Join us if you're eager to make a significant impact and be part of an explosive-growth startup from the ground up.
one_liner: Same-Day Auto Repair for Commercial Fleets.
